directions: Combine first 4 ingredients in blender. Add 1 tablespoon maple syrup and blend until smooth, adding more maple syrup to taste, if desired. Pour smoothie into 2 glasses. Top each smoothie with berries and serve.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh or frozen unsweetened berries (such as raspberries, blueberries, blackberries, or diced strawberries)
Fresh raspberries, blackberries, or strawberries (for garnish)
title: Berry and Banana Frullato
